name: Burn Your Roots - GGJ 2023 "Root's"
description:
In a near future where the elderly have taken over the world and their retirement is sucking all the money out of the government. The hero is contacted to solve this problem by a strange character - code name of the operation: Operation Burn The Roots.

"Burn your roots" is a project made for the Global Game Jam 2023 "Roots".
